pkgmetadata.longdescription: Knapsack Routines // Provides knapsack routines from the book `Knapsack Problems: Algorithms and Computer Implementations' by S. Martello and P. Toth http://www.or.deis.unibo.it/knapsack.html. knapsack is a wrapper package for R. The use of the Fortran codes is restricted to personal research and academic purposes only.
